articles.description: Earlier on Sunday, Babil Khan, son of late actor Irrfan Khan, shared a candid photo of the actor playing with a cat. He also shared a video taken by the actor.
articles.content: Late actor Irrfan Khan's elder son Babil Khan took to Instagram and shared a throwback photo of the actor who can be seen playing with his cat. He also shared a video which seems to have been taken by Irrfan himself where the cat can be seen licking his hand.… [+1682 chars]
